programme.title: Portlandia
programme.sub-title: The Story of Toni and Candace
programme.desc: The origin of the feminist bookstore; a merger between two corporate book retailers pits Toni and Candace against one another in fierce competition to be head of the Chick Lit Department.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Lance and Nina feel pressure when Lance's mom and her new boyfriend visit.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Medical solutions are sought when a series of health ailments occurs.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: The Ecoterrorists travel to San Diego to take down their next target, Seaworld.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Kath and Dave decide to host an unforgettable 4th of July barbecue; the Mayor searches the deep Web for some very special fireworks.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Quinn is recruited at Portland's Dollar Store as the face for their rebranding campaign; Spyke faces trial for making unlicensed Bart Simpson merchandise.

programme.title: The Death of Stalin
programme.desc: When dictator Joseph Stalin dies, his parasitic cronies square off in a frantic power struggle to become the next Soviet leader. As they bumble, brawl and back-stab their way to the top, the question remains -- just who is running the government?

programme.title: Burke & Hare
programme.desc: Two 19th-century opportunists (Simon Pegg, Andy Serkis) become serial killers so that they can maintain their profitable business supplying cadavers to an anatomist (Tom Wilkinson).

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A married crime novelist finds himself in a tough predicament when an eccentric mystic summons the spirit of his first wife during a s√©ance.

programme.title: Diminished Capacity
programme.desc: A brain-damaged man (Matthew Broderick) takes his senile uncle (Alan Alda) and an ex-sweetheart (Virginia Madsen) to Chicago, where they hope to sell a rare baseball card.

programme.title: Dealin' With Idiots
programme.desc: A comic looks for inspiration for his next movie among the absurdly competitive parents and coaches involved with his son's youth-baseball league.

programme.title: Super
programme.desc: After his wife (Liv Tyler) leaves him, a fry cook (Rainn Wilson) emulates a TV superhero and transforms himself into a costumed vigilante.

programme.title: The Opening Act
programme.desc: A stand-up comedian encounters relentless hecklers, drunken groupies and hard-to-impress DJs after landing a gig as an emcee for his idol.

programme.title: Sleepwalk With Me
programme.desc: Anxiety over his stalled career and outside pressure to marry his longtime lover (Lauren Ambrose) push a commitment-shy comic (Mike Birbiglia) to sleepwalk.

programme.title: The Decoy Bride
programme.desc: A local woman (Kelly Macdonald) is hired to draw paparazzi away from a Hollywood actress (Alice Eve) who has come to Scotland to get married.

programme.title: Greener Grass
programme.desc: Soccer moms Jill and Lisa compete for approval and acceptance in a bizarre suburbia while their kids battle it out on the playing field.

programme.title: The Female Brain
programme.desc: When a female scientist studies the differences between the male and female brain, her findings dictate how she lives her life.

programme.title: The Nowhere Inn
programme.desc: Two creative forces band together to make a documentary about St. Vincent's music and life. However, they soon discover unpredictable forces lurking within subject and filmmaker that threatens to derail their friendship and the project.

programme.title: Band Aid
programme.desc: A bickering couple make one last effort to save their marriage by turning their arguments into songs and forming a band.
